content: f r e e p a t t e r n crown tutorial make chain of 23 chain stitches in round materials yarn yarnart begonia 100% cotton #439 50 g/160 m 1-3 row 1 chain 23 single_crochet slip_stitch hook 1 25 mm abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet 4 row skip 3 stitches and begin in 4th *2 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 1 chain slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch in previous stitch double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet skip 3 stitches repeat from * till * 4 times slip_stitch at the end skill level easy/medium how to watch video to scan a qr code simply find the video tutorial on open any free barcode scanner application the qr code scanner application automatically recognizes any qr code follow me or click on a line and you`ll get studiowowtoysua @studio wow_toys to a video tutorial maria zhyrakova @studiowowtoys
